name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @pglesports ……

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 25, Huizhou, Guangdong. The boss of Panda Buzou Baking Co., Ltd. ran away, and the employees went to the city government to protest for wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/FeS1iyURDu

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Lingnan Chinese and English School in Tianhe District, Guangzhou City will be closed down, and more than 400 primary school students are facing the dilemma of having no books to read. Nearly 100 parents are preparing to sign collectively and hold banners to petition for rights protection at the Education Bureau. The police called one by one and warned them at their homes. At the petition signing site, more than a dozen police officers drove special police cars and buses to maintain stability. 
All the more than 70 parents who signed to petition in the WeChat chat group received phone calls and door-to-door warnings from the police

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Media Coverage

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 25, retired employees held a rights protection march on the campus of Shenyang University of Chemical Technology.
It is required to provide living allowances based on equal pay for equal work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Caution]
On March 24, a video of a teacher at Guli Township Central Kindergarten in Shangqiu Town, Henan Province abusing a left-behind child was leaked.
In the video, the teacher kept beating the child and even rode on him. In another video, the child cried and kowtowed for mercy, while the teacher laughed while recording the video.
According to an insider, the child is five or six years old and is a left-behind child who usually lives with his grandparents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 25, some netizens took photos of a decoration city in Pizhou, Jiangsu, displaying banners congratulating Putin on his re-election as Russian president.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 25, the Yucheng County People's Government issued a statement saying that after preliminary investigation, the online rumors were true, and the kindergarten involved was rectified, the principal was suspended, the staff involved were fired, and a special person was arranged to provide psychological counseling for the students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of March 24, Shaoxing. After the 47th round of the CBA regular season, Zhejiang fans insulted Northeast fans across the road.
Then the Northeast fans crossed the road guardrail and the two sides had a physical conflict.
In the early morning of the 25th, the police reported that they had summoned the offender Yang Moumou to the scene for investigation in accordance with the law. At present, Yang Moumou has been punished by administrative detention by the police in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 24, Zhengzhou, Henan. A delivery man was delivering food to Songshan Wushu Vocational College when the security guard detained the food. The delivery man was beaten by the security guard when he asked for an explanation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 25, a knife attack occurred at Xiaozhai Overpass in Xi'an, Shaanxi. 
According to online reports, a 17-year-old boy stabbed a 25-year-old man to death due to a relationship dispute.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/fkjJTzLvKm

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 24, Taiyuan, Shanxi. The Taihe Jinzunfu real estate project has been unfinished for seven years and has not yet been delivered. The owners gathered at the sales office to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 25, Chaoyang, Liaoning. The Xishan Swimwear Factory owed workers wages, and the workers came to the factory to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 25, Changtu County, Tieling City, Liaoning Province. A large number of elderly people protested their rights outside the Changtu County People's Court because their pensions were in arrears.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 25, Zigong, Sichuan. The Southwest Agricultural Commercial Bank project was left unfinished, and a woman was held on the ground and taken away by the police while defending her rights.
It is reported that in the early sales, the company said that it would help rent the shop after it was acquired, and pay a part of the money in the early stage, and the rent from the later rent would be deducted from the house payment. However, the project is now completely unfinished, and many people have bought several shops, invested all their savings and even took out loans, and lost everything

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of March 25, residents protested in front of the Muling Municipal Government in Mudanjiang City, Heilongjiang Province, against the heating company's early suspension of heating.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 25, in Heping Village, Yilong Town, Yian County, Heilongjiang Province, the collective land of the villagers was privately contracted and sold by village cadres. The villagers gathered outside the Yian County Government and the Heping Village Committee to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 25 (Release) Beijing. Several policemen in uniform lined up to petition at the National Bureau of Letters and Calls. The petitioner asked the police, "How many of you are here to defend your rights?" The police replied, "Four people. At first there were seven people, but later they were suppressed and three of them returned."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 25, in Huanbei Silk Garment City, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, a man dragged a woman and pushed her directly down the escalator.
According to the person who filmed the video, the woman owed money to the processing factory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
